faction_profile.name: 사천당문 (Sichuan Tang Family / 四川唐門)
alias: Tang Family of Poison (당가 / 唐家)
Masters of Poison and Hidden Weapons

location.base: Tang Family Village (당가타 / 唐家陀) - A massive fortress-village solely for the Tang bloodline.

heritage.origin: Recorded in history (Ming Dynasty) as masters of 'Tang Family Fist' (Dangmun-gwon).
heritage.wuxia_adaptation: Evolved into masters of Poison and Hidden Weapons based on texts like 'Musul-hoejong'.

faction_profile.political_stance: Grey / Neutral-Evil within the Orthodox faction. Often treated as semi-Sapa (Unorthodox) due to their use of poison.
faction_profile.social_structure: Strict Patrilineal Bloodline. Uses 'Son-in-law entry' (Matrilocal marriage) to absorb outside talent, but power stays with the Tang surname.

personality: Volatile: Quick-tempered but calculating when it comes to revenge.
Exclusive: Strongly distrusts outsiders. Divided into Inner Family (Bloodline) and Outer Family (Servants/In-laws).

combat_style.summary: Mid-to-Long range suppression using overwhelming barrage of projectiles and debilitating poisons.
combat_style.fear_factor: Enemies die without knowing how they were hit (Invisible poison/needles).
combat_style.taboo: In some settings, using poison is despised, so they claim it's 'Medicine' or 'Art'.

signature_ultimate.name: 만천화우 (Ten Thousand Flower Rain / 滿天花雨)
signature_ultimate.description: The ultimate technique covering the sky with hidden weapons. Inescapable death.

manual: 만류귀종 (Ten Thousand Streams Return to Origin) - Controlling weapons to return to the user.
염왕첩 (King of Hell's Invitation) - Single target instant kill.
mechanized: 폭우이화침 (Torrential Rain Pear Blossom Needle) - Legendary mechanism firing hundreds of needles at once.
청린마화 (Blue Scale Demon Fire) - Chemical fire.

poison_arts.concept: Poisons are divided by effect (melting, paralyzing, hallucinating).
antidotes_and_elixirs: 백초거독환 (Hundred Herb Detox Pill) - General antidote.

internal_energy.name: 만류귀원신공 (Ten Thousand Streams Return Divine Art)

movement: 미허신보 (Void Step) - Used to create distance for throwing.

projectiles: 자모표 (Mother and Son Dart) - A dart within a dart.
mechanisms: 천독절명침통 (Thousand Poison Life Ending Needle Case)

narrative_role: The 'Wild Card' in the Murim Alliance.
Providers of antidotes or rare poisons for the plot.
A romantic interest who is dangerous ('Rose with thorns').
Antagonists who use traps and ambushes rather than fair duels.
